title: Police investigate I-88 crash
text: Daily Herald report One person sustained minor injuries in a crash on Interstate 88 near Oak Brook Sunday afternoon, officials said. The crash, which occurred about 12:30 p.m., involved a passenger car and a semitrailer on westbound I-88 near Midwest Road, according to a news release from Illinois State Police. The driver of the passenger car sustained minor cuts and bruises but refused medical treatment at the scene, authorities said. One traffic lane was temporarily closed but has since been reopened, officials said. The cause of the crash is under investigation. Share this page
